events.message: I recently received my order but unfortunately I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected.
The customer's message indicates a request for a refund due to dissatisfaction with the product.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like a refund and I'm here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can process your request efficiently?
My order number is 452789. The product did not match the description on your website, so I want my money back.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process. You should receive the money back within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and for processing the refund. I appreciate your help.
The refund request has been successfully processed and the case is now resolved. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory on your end.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your cooperation and have a great day!
You will receive a survey shortly to rate your experience with our support team.
